Author: GitHub
Description:
Anders Hejlsberg, the creator of TypeScript and C#, shares why he deeply respects languages like Rust, Go, and Python. He explains that getting any language to a level of relevance is incredibly difficult and that every successful language brings something valuable to the table, from Rust's borrow checker to Go's simplicity.

#AndersHejlsberg #Rust #Go

Title: Every programming language teaches us something
